bug.author: vobecant
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The GAN example for MNIST doesn't work as advised in the script basic_gan_module.py <denchmark-h:h2>Please reproduce using the BoringModel and post here</denchmark-h>
To reproduce the issue just run: basic_gan_module.py --gpus 1 <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Train the GAN network well for MNIST dataset with the default setting. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Dear <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vobecant>@vobecant</denchmark-link> , Are you referring to Bolt examples (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts</denchmark-link> ) ? If yes, could you open an issue there ? Best, T.C
Dear <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tchaton>@tchaton</denchmark-link> , yes, I am. I will open the issue there.
